Name: Throttle CPU speed
Description: Can I throttle CPU speed to simulate slower machines?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Name: Throttle CPU speed
Chrome.Notes: 1. In the **Performance** panel, open **Settings** using the gear icon and select the "CPU: No throttling" dropdown to choose "4x/6x slowdown".

Edge.Name: Throttle CPU speed
Edge.Notes: 1. In the **Performance** panel, open **Settings** using the gear icon and select the "CPU: No throttling" dropdown to choose "4x/6x slowdown".

Opera.Name: Throttle CPU speed
Opera.Notes: 1. In the **Performance** panel, open **Settings** using the gear icon and select the "CPU: No throttling" dropdown to choose "4x/6x slowdown".
